name: goodbye (Maker School)
description:
Use right key to move forward and left key to move backwards. Use the space bar to jump. 

Try to collect all the coins to get maximum points. Also grab the cake at the end of each level to go to next level. Try to avoid falling through the floor. If you do you will lose a life. You have 3 lives and if you lose all 3 you will have to start again. Try to finish all the levels and gain the most points. :)

KIRBY LIKES CAKE, GET HIM CAKE.
